li.strong: Get the Pierce County app for your mobile device today!

ul.li: 1. Search for "SchoolPointe" or "Stay Connected" in the app store
3. Open the app and search for Pierce County
4. Optionally: In the app settings, deselect the school(s) you don't want to follow

img.alt: The new high school recently opened.
Pierce County High School graduates walking across the stage and receiving a diploma.
Pierce County High School graduates throwing graduation caps in the air
Patterson students that were in the Shrek drama
Girl in flag core holding flaming batons

Pierce County High School football players breaking banner and running onto field

span.p: Pierce County Schools will begin distributing meal boxes weekly for students instead of delivering meals by bus.

span.p: Governor Kemp has issued an executive order closing all K-12 schools in Georgia for in-person instruction through the remainder of this school year.
